item.title: Humble Games Showcase 2025 set for March 12
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/humble-games-showcase-2025-set-for-march-12

Featuring Lost Skies, Monaco 2, Threads of Time, and more.

Humble Games will host Humble Games Showcase 2025 on March 12 at 9:00 a.m. PT / 12:00 p.m. ET, the publisher announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube.

The broadcast, hosted by Twitch broadcaster and entertainer AshSaidHi, will start with a countdown show featuring titles from independent publishing partners including Akupara Games, Alawar, and more. The main show will feature the following:

  • New reveals from Lost Skies and Monaco 2.
  • An “exciting new reveal” from upcoming 2.5D JRPG Threads of Time.
  • Updates from the recently released On Your Tail and Wizard of Legend II.
  • A “toe-tapping” new look at Billie Bust Up.
  • Two “never-before-seen world premieres.”
  • And more!
